## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATCESA8, CESA8, IRX1, LEW2</u>
- **Gene Name:** CELLULOSE SYNTHASE 8, CELLULOSE SYNTHASE 8, IRREGULAR XYLEM 1, LEAF WILTING 2
- **Description:**   cellulose synthase family protein;(source:Araport11)
